channel.title: devops on T-Mobile Open Source
channel.description: Recent content in devops on T-Mobile Open Source

item.title: Serverless Development Challenges
item.description: This article describes the challenges I faced and my observations while designing and developing the Jazz framework. Jazz is an application development framework for developing and managing serverless (aka FaaS) services. Jazz itself is built on top of Jazz and currently supports the best known FaaS implementation from AWS, ‘AWS Lambda’. Jazz started as an internal initiative in T-Mobile and is now available on github as an open source project.
